issue.title: [Python] Miscellaneous pyarrow MSVC fixes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-867](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-867). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a key step in achieving Windows support

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-867?focusedCommentId=15985926) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I adjusted title. ARROW-885 should be the last item needed to get a passing test suite in Appveyor
